basicInfo.name: Charles
basicInfo.flavor: The lich infused magic into Charles and took him in as a soldier. Although he gained power, Charles has become an undead with no conscience.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Deathly Hunger
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 170% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 85% chance to inflict Bleed [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 170% of Physical Attack.

profile.story:
In life, Charles was a famous dancer. He tried to cross Dark Grave in order to keep up with a busy tour schedule, but was bitten by the undead ghoul Derek.
Turned into a zombie and unable to find food, he languished in endless torment; his body withering, and his insatiable hunger never ceasing.
In his desperation, Charles began to hunt for prey.
Then, Bane approached Charles and cast black magic on him, turning him into a soldier under his command.

basicInfo.name: Charles
basicInfo.flavor: The zombie Charles learned that by preying on the weak, he could obtain more power. He now seeks prey to strengthen himself.

 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

basicInfo.name: Charles
basicInfo.flavor: Charles was a famous dancer before he wandered into the Dark Grave, where he was bitten by the zombie, Derek. He may be a zombie now, but his body still remembers how to dance!
